mapper.select: SELECT hsp.hospital_id, hsp.hospital_name, hsp.hospital_address, hsp.hospital_organ_loc, hcm.hospital_category_name, hsp.hospital_phone, hsp.hospital_latitude, hsp.hospital_longitude FROM hospital AS hsp LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_category hsc ON hsp.hospital_id = hsc.hospital_id LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_category_mst hcm ON hsc.hospital_category_id = hcm.hospital_category_id WHERE hsp.hospital_id = #{hospitalId};

SELECT DISTINCT hsp.hospital_id, hsp.hospital_name, hsp.hospital_address, hsp.hospital_organ_loc, COUNT(*) OVER() AS total_count FROM hospital AS hsp LEFT OUTER JOIN hospital_operating_hours hoh ON (hsp.hospital_id = hoh.hospital_id) WHERE hsp.hospital_type != '약국' AND hsp.hospital_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%') AND hoh.day_of_week = DAYNAME(STR_TO_DATE(#{nowDay}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND #{hospitalOpen} BETWEEN start_time AND end_time AND hoh.end_time > #{nightOpen} AND hsp.hospital_emergency = #{emergency} LIMIT #{page}, 20;
